title: Fix documentation example
body:
I set out to make the documentation example copy-pastable. I discovered issues effecting the current version:

* The regular expression causes an error.
* The validation error details array only ever contains one error.
* The returned error was represented as a string rather than an object.

Thank you so much for the exceptional library!
